input_text:
Job Title: Forklift Driver

Location: Van Buren Township, MI

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Are you looking for an opportunity to join a diverse and supportive team? Join Pro Staff and we will get you connected with our partner company who thrives on supplying high-quality flooring solutions with years of growing success! We are seeking a Forklift Driver in Van Buren Township, MI. Our client believes in offering products and experiences that are innovative, sustainable, and that bring out the beauty in all types of flooring. And above all, value their hard-working team that makes it all possible! Bring your hard work ethic, eagerness to learn and keep growing, and get ready to embark on a rewarding career with a team that puts you first and a company that you are proud to represent.

Forklift Driver Essential Tasks

Safely operate forklift equipment.Utilize RF scanners for inventory management.Load/unload materials.Pick and stage trailers.Perform cycle counting tasks.Assist with carpet cutting tasks.Engage in various warehouse duties as needed.

Qualified candidates will have one year of forklift experience.

Schedule: 1:30pm – 10:00pm, Monday – Friday

Pay rate: $16 – 18/hr.

The services you offer are not without uplifting benefits to show our appreciation for your time and energy! Payday every single Friday by direct deposit or pay card. You will have access to a dedicated local team that cares about your success and is here to support you every step of the way. Don't forget about our employee discounts and referral bonus potential. We offer medical, dental, vision, and 401K options to suit you and your family's needs.

Ready to seize this exciting opportunity? Click "Apply Now" to connect with our dedicated recruiter and take the first step towards an enriching career journey with us!

After you have applied, download our Staffmark Group WorkNOW App to receive real-time job offers and apply for additional opportunities. You can download it from the App Store or get it on Google Play. 

About Pro Staff

Pro Staff is committed to providing equal employment opportunity for all persons regardless of race, color, religion (including religious dress and grooming practices), sex, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital status, national origin, ancestry, citizenship status, pregnancy, medical condition, genetic information, mental and physical disability, political affiliation, union membership, status as a parent, military or veteran status or other non-merit based factors. We will provide reasonable accommodations throughout the application, interviewing and employment process. If you require a reasonable accommodation, contact us. Pro Staff is an E-Verify employer. This policy is applicable to all phases of the employment relationship, including hiring, transfers, promotions, training, terminations, working conditions, compensation, benefits, and other terms and conditions of employment.

All employees are directed to familiarize themselves with this policy and to act in accordance with it. All decisions with respect to employment matters and other phases of employer-temporary employee relationships will be in keeping with this policy and in accordance with all applicable laws and regulations.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Forklift Driver
output_json.summary: Join Pro Staff and our partner company for a rewarding career in Van Buren Township, MI.
job_responsibilities: Utilize RF scanners for inventory management.
Engage in various warehouse duties as needed.
benefits: Payday every single Friday by direct deposit or pay card.
Access to a dedicated local team.
